availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary J. Moore on January 31, 1854. Father of Ann P. Moore and Julia E. Moore. Laborer in Bullitt County in 1850 and in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 171. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, District no. 1, p. 697. Kentucky Marriage Records - 1852-1954), Meade County Marriages. Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7007128, May 1894 Deaths, p. 314. Find A Grave, "Isaac Moore (1831-1894)," Memorial #83309593, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/83309593 (accessed August 29, 2018).
